QuestData.Title: Zhu's Despair
QuestData.Description: Hmm... Is that Yi-Mo kid over there?$B$B<Ken-Ken squints against the increasing torrents of rain.>$B$BIt is! He's at the well, and he's not lookin' so good.$B$BKen-Ken got a bad feeling about this...
QuestData.LogDescription: Exorcise the Sha of Despair energy from Yi-Mo Longbrow in Zhu's Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: We did some good work here today, $p.$B$BMonastery always tell us to leave a place better than we find it.
